credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: Study of Drapery of "Fortune"
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
medium: Black crayon, white chalk, on purple paper
description: Narrow section of drapery, extending from upper left to lower right. Signed and inscribed in pencil, lower right: "E. Vedder study of drapery / for Fortune owned by Charles Keck."
name: Drawing
